Prerequisites: PREREQUISITE(S): ACG 2021 AND ACG 2071 WITH A MINIMUM GRADE OF B IN EACH COURSE.
Course Description: A STUDY OF THE FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING CONCEPTUAL FRAMEWORK, THE ACCOUNTING PROCESS, AND THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND NOTES TO FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.  COURSE INCLUDES THE STUDY OF PRESENT VALUE ANALYSIS. STUDENTS MAY ATTEMPT ACG 3103 NO MORE THAN TWO TIMES.
Textbook(s):
INTERMEDIATE ACCOUNTING, 15TH EDITION
KIESO&WEYGANDT
JOHN WILEY & SONS
NY, NY 2014
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
